HomePage.title: Welcome to Hui Embroidery
HomePage.subtitle: Excellence in Xiang Embroidery Haute Couture
HomePage.description: Here you can admire exquisite Xiang embroidery works and understand the exquisite craftsmanship of the Maomao technique.

hero.title: Hui Embroidery
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Xiang Embroidery Haute Couture
hero.description: We focus on the inheritance and innovation of Xiang embroidery art, founded by international embroidery master Mao Hui. As the third-generation inheritor of the Maomao technique, we perfectly combine over thirty years of exquisite craftsmanship with modern aesthetics to present unique haute couture embroidery art.

featuredArtworks.title: Featured Artworks
featuredArtworks.subtitle: Showcasing the exquisite craftsmanship and aesthetic innovation of Xiang embroidery

latestPosts.title: Latest News
latestPosts.subtitle: Stay updated with Xiang embroidery art news and technique sharing

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Heritage and Innovation of Xiang Embroidery Family
about.description: Hui Embroidery was founded by international embroidery master Mao Hui, focusing on haute couture Xiang embroidery art. We uphold the traditional Maomao technique while combining modern aesthetic concepts, with every piece being a perfect combination of art and craftsmanship.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We welcome exchanges about Xiang embroidery art and haute couture
